product_title: Good Legs High Waist Raw Hem Skinny Jeans
product_description: Made with a gap-proof contoured waistband and a high waist that lengthens your legs, these fraying skinnies are designed to flatter every curve.
product_details_and_care:
Made with a gap-proof contoured waistband and a high waist that lengthens your legs, these fraying skinnies are designed to flatter every curve.
